title: One font, six gigposters: Aesthetic Apparatus, Largemammal Print, Smokestack, The Heads Of State, The Small Stakes
content:
The following gigposters all use the same font (I think), but I don't know the name of it. Any help would be appreciated.

Aesthetic Apparatus:  
"FOREVER GOLDRUSH"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=7191](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=7191 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=7191")

"CHRISTIAN MARCLAY"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=34497](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=34497 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=34497")

Largemammal Print:  
"FRANZ FERDINAND"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=31322](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=31322 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=31322")

Smokestack:  
"LOW"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=41973](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=41973 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=41973")

The Heads Of State:  
"TIGERSTYLE"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=21054](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=21054 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=21054")

The Small Stakes:  
"LES SAVY FAV"  
 [http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=23073](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=23073 "http://gigposters.com/posters.php?poster=23073")
author: eightone

comments.content: [FF Zapata](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.10991.0.0), [Platon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/www.csaimages.com/results.asp?image=FNT018&wwwflag=2&imagepos=1), [Archive Antique Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-antique-extended/?refby=typographica), and [58 Rodeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=BL.116991.0.0) are all based on old woodtype which was known by names such as Antique Extended or Hellenic Wide.

i made a rough version, similar to this a year or so ago....

[http://helloproduct.com/type.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/helloproduct.com/type.html "http://helloproduct.com/type.html")

Thanks to both of you!  
With Hellenic as a starting point, I did some digging and found [Hefty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/hefty.htm) wich I think is the font used on all but one of the posters above. The Largemammal Print “FRANZ FERDINAND” poster I think might use [hello\_caleb's Ethan font.](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023232931/http:/helloproduct.com/type.html)  
So thanks again.
